name: Crypto is Splitting into RegFi and DarkFi
description:
The true promise of crypto is the creation of parallel agorist economies. Anonymous technics enable crypto to decouple from the surveillance state. DarkFi provides tools to accelerate this trend.


DarkFi anonymous smart contracts enable us to build anti-fragile, self-sovereign infrastructure and unstoppable lunarpunk economies.


This talk will present a bull thesis for privacy and give a technical overview of DarkFi, a proof-of-stake blockchain powered by lunarpunk principles.
